General.Name: MCLON JEWELLERY Co.Ltd.
General.Description: MCLON JEWELLERY Co.,Ltd. offers fashion jewelry in China and internationally. The company primarily provides hangings, diamond rings, bracelets, earrings, necklaces, ear ornaments, pendants, and bangles. It sells its products through shopping mall counters and online shops. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
